agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, February 19, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will meet to hear invited testimony on issues related to subsidence, desalination, and river authorities. Invited testimony only. An agenda will be available at the hearing. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
